interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/09/07
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ben Bolt', 'Paul Seed'], 'Producers': ['Mark Crowdy'], 'Starring': ['Martin Clunes', 'Caroline Catz'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']}
Review Text: We find the Doc Martin series very interesting and more importantly very intertaining.  We have to be careful about when we watch because we cannot quit until we have seen all of the episodes in the season.  End up staying up very late sometimes because we cannot bear not to know what comes next!
Review Title: Review of Season 5 Doc Martin
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
